fields.abstract: Be clear what Blender is, where to download it, what it can achieve, sources of community support.
Develop basic familiarity with the main parts of the default user interface.

Learn how to use the number pad to control your point of view in the 3D viewport.
Watch the video that accompanies this lesson, then load the faceviewcube.blend file into blender and try it out for yourself.
Features of the 7 continents of Earth.
